channel.title: 317 [PI] need help with spawning items
channel.description: i want to make my server a spawn but i want certain items to be only spawn able for staff members? how can i do this someone please help me thank you!

item.title: 317 [PI] need help with spawning items
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[size=15pt]error: variable args is already defined[/size]

Meaning, you’ve added it twice. Delete one of them.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 [PI] need help with spawning items

item.description:

please help im new to this i would appreciate some help as you know what you are doing please. i just tryed to add and this is what i got

isrc\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:766: error: variable args is alre

ady defined in method processPacket(Client,int,int)
String[] args = playerCommand.split("_")
;
^

Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: 317 [PI] need help with spawning items
item.dc:creator: @erlasz erlasz
item.description:
@erlasz wrote:

and i add this where here is my (“item”) command

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >= 3) {
if (c.inWild())
return;
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::pickup 995 200”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
		}

Read full topic

item.title: 317 [PI] need help with spawning items
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

					int[] STAFFONLY = { 1,2,3 };
					String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
					for (int d = 0; d < STAFFONLY.length; d++) {
					if (Integer.parseInt(args[1]) == d && c.playerRights < 1) {
					c.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item.");
					return;
					}
				}

Read full topic
